alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 22 at 11:47PM AKDT until August 23 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will likely wash away. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds gusting to nearly 50 mph will continue through Wednesday. These winds are pushing waves high up the beach to near the vegetation line causing minor erosion and washing away items left on the beach. The worst conditions will be on west and northwest facing beaches. Winds and waves will decrease Wednesday afternoon
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
